title: Elementalist Lux Game UI Bug
body: As you can see it says i'm playing Nami but the light form sign is there as well as the rest of the odd ui. Any other skin I play on is fine but elementalist always makes me reconnect to get this error out. Even when I reconnect there will still be minor issues like disappearing minion health bars. I would appreciate some feedback on this issue because I love playing with this skin.

replies.body: Happened to me twice in a row in a ranked game ._. It's really annoying and it throws me out of the game and gives me bugsplat . Repair didn't help so I just won't use the skin until it's confirmed that this bug is out of the picture
I'd try repairing your game files using the hextech tool and see if the problem persists if I were you. Doesn't seem to be happening to me, so I'm not sure if I can re-create it.
